``capitalize``
==============

The ``capitalize`` filter capitalizes a value. The first character will be
uppercase, all others lowercase:

<<<<<<< HEAD
.. code-block:: jinja
=======
.. code-block:: twig
>>>>>>> 5784ff225e0936923e865fd418aab2eda72985f9

    {{ 'my first car'|capitalize }}

    {# outputs 'My first car' #}
